name: Die Like I Want
description:
What do you do when you are in a place that brings you back when you die but you must die the right way Can you explore the right way?

Assets used for game

Pistol by Zsky

Crates By Quaternius

Characters By EMD Tools

All The Sounds from HQ Fps Weapons Impacts Sounds

All Impacts Particles by Unity Particles Package x5

All The Textures From Ambient TC

Control 

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

Left Mouse Click - Fire

C - Slide

x - Cancel the slide
